title: Ornaments to complement Caxton
content:
I'm working on a display for a 20's pre-deco building in NYC with a steam locomotive theme; Caxton has been picked by the client as the typeface. I need to find some ornaments to help the text, basically enhanced vertical and horizontal rules; decoration is not my strong suit. Any suggestions?

This seemed like it was heading in the right direction, but it's a little steep for approximately four uses.  
 [http://typophile.com/node/51317](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017043910/http:/typophile.com/node/51317 "http://typophile.com/node/51317")

Thanks,

Tom
author: tsimon
